snippet.title: Runner3 Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
The latest and greatest rhythm/action runner in the BIT.TRIP series is coming to Nintendo Switch on May 22! In Runner3, you'll guide CommanderVideo and his friends through a dizzying gauntlet of obstacle-filled landscapes, crazy vehicle excursions and big boss battles as they pursue the dreaded Timbletot, enemy of love and happiness! 

Be sure to preorder your physical copy today at your favorite game shop or online retailer. The launch edition will include Nicalis' trademark bonanza of bonus goodies for a limited time: a full color instruction manual, a 3" soundtrack sampler audio CD and a PVC character strap of CommanderVideo with light-up LED visor! 

Nicalis Web site: 
https://www.nicalis.com/

News & Updates: 
https://blog.nicalis.com/

Nicalis on Twitter: 
https://twitter.com/nicalis

Nicalis on Facebook: 
https://www.facebook.com/NicalisInc/
